channel.title: Using R for Reproducible Research | Academic

item.title: Lab 1 - Shaping Data
item.description:
Loading libraries.

library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)

Loading in the data.

library(readxl)

data = read_excel("data/Lab1_data.xlsx")

## New names:
## * `` -> ...1
## * `` -> ...3
## * `` -> ...4
## * `` -> ...5
## * `` -> ...6
## * ...

head(data)

## # A tibble: 6 × 13
##   ...1   Noisy ...3  ...4  ...5  ...6  ...7  Quiet ...9  ...10 ...11 ...12 ...13
##   <chr>  <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr>
## 1 <NA>   Morn… <NA>  Afte… <NA>  Even… <NA>  Morn… <NA>  Afte… <NA>  Even… <NA> 
## 2 Parti… A     B     A     B     A     B     A     B     A     B     A     B    
## 3 1      61    77    97    97    89    94    87    87    65    53    79    51   
## 4 2      100   68    92    57    55    85    96    88    91    56    90    53   
## 5 3      70    56    89    78    98    73    86    86    99    92    67    96   
## 6 4      100   84    59    85    73    74    50    62    89    61    85    67
